title: I registered for IPCC in February 2015. Am I eligible for November 2018 exams? - Quora

response.answer_text: Your registration expires exactly after completion of 4 yrs from the date of registration for IPCC. In that case your registration expires in Feb 2019, so Nov 18 would be your last attempt & you are eligible to attempt.

You are eligible to answer IPCC exams for 4 years from the date of registration. Your registration ends on Feb 2019. So I'm assuming you are eligible. In case this period expires you get the re-registration form online from the ICAI website itself. All the best!
